name: HIT
description:
This is the first project by EP4.As a newcomer to the gaming industry, I present you with the game I made to kill time while you waiting anything or anyone.
The game was created as a car simulator. In subsequent updates, new cars will also be added to the map and the open world, physics will get a new character similar to real life, optimization will also be made in updates.

The gameplay begins with a garage from which you need to leave and move in search of entry into the mountainous area, having overcome the mountainous area, namely, having made a circle through the mountainous area, you need to return. In the next update, after completing the mission, you will have access to a map that leads to another town.
